com.samsung.samm.common

Class SOptionSAMM

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.samm.common.SOptionSAMM

  • public class SOptionSAMM
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to save/load SAMM files.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • SAMM_LOAD_OPTION_CONVERT_SIZE_FITTOSIZE

        public static final int SAMM_LOAD_OPTION_CONVERT_SIZE_FITTOSIZE
        Changes the resolution of an image to fit the canvas size; the resulting image's width and height ratio can vary from the original.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2, SAMM Library 1.4
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SAMM_LOAD_OPTION_CONVERT_SIZE_FITINSIDE

        public static final int SAMM_LOAD_OPTION_CONVERT_SIZE_FITINSIDE
        Loads an image in a resolution that fits the canvas size. The image's original width and height ratio is retained while the size is adjusted to fit inside the canvas.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2, SAMM Library 1.4
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SAMM_LOAD_OPTION_CONVERT_SIZE_ORIGINAL

        public static final int SAMM_LOAD_OPTION_CONVERT_SIZE_ORIGINAL
        Load in the original size without changing the resolution. (The width and height ratio retained.)
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2, SAMM Library 1.4
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SAMM_DECODE_PRIORITY_FG_OBJECT

        public static final int SAMM_DECODE_PRIORITY_FG_OBJECT
        Decode the object data first to skip decoding the foreground image.
        If there is not the object data encoded, try to decode the foreground image.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2, SAMM Library 1.4
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SAMM_DECODE_PRIORITY_FG_IMAGE

        public static final int SAMM_DECODE_PRIORITY_FG_IMAGE
        Decode the foreground image first to skip decoding the object data.
        If there is not the foreground image encoded, try to decode the object data.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2, SAMM Library 1.4
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • setConvertCanvasHorizontalAlignOption

        public boolean setConvertCanvasHorizontalAlignOption(int nConvertCanvasHAlignOption)
        Sets the horizontal alignment option to change the contents location in the canvas when loading. The default value is SAMM_LOAD_OPTION_CONVERT_FITTOSIZE. This option is only valid when the "CanvasSizeOption" is not SAMM_LOAD_OPTION_CONVERT_SIZE_FITTOSIZE.
        Parameters:
        nConvertCanvasHAlignOption - The horizontal alignment option to change the contents location in the canvas
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2, SAMM Library 1.4

      • setConvertCanvasVerticalAlignOption

        public boolean setConvertCanvasVerticalAlignOption(int nConvertCanvasVAlignOption)
        Sets the vertical alignment option to change the contents location in the canvas when loading. The default value is SAMM_LOAD_OPTION_CONVERT_FITTOSIZE. This option is only valid when the "CanvasSizeOption" is not SAMM_LOAD_OPTION_CONVERT_SIZE_FITTOSIZE.
        Parameters:
        nConvertCanvasHAlignOption - The vertical alignment option to change the contents of the canvas
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2, SAMM Library 1.4

      • setSaveImageSize

        public boolean setSaveImageSize(int nSaveSizeOption)
        Sets the save option for the image size. The default is SAMM_SAVE_OPTION_DEFAULT_SIZE.
        The save option must be between SAMM_SAVE_OPTION_DEFAULT_SIZE and SAMM_SAVE_OPTION_THUMNAIL_SIZE.
        If nSaveSizeOption falls below the range, return true; if out of the range, return false.
        Parameters:
        nSaveSizeOption - The save size to set
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getSaveImageSize

        public int getSaveImageSize()
        Gets the current size to save the image as : SAMM_SAVE_OPTION_DEFAULT_SIZE ~ SAMM_SAVE_OPTION_THUMNAIL_SIZE
        Returns:
        The size to save the image as
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • setJPGImageQuality

        public boolean setJPGImageQuality(int nJPGImageQuality)
        Sets the JPEG image quality save option. The default is 100.
        The quality value (nJPGImageQuality) must be between 1 and 100.
        If nJPGImageQuality falls within the valid range, it returns true; if it is out of the range, it returns false.
        Parameters:
        nJPGImageQuality - The quality value to set
        Returns:
        Whether or not to set the quality value
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getJPGImageQuality

        Returns:

        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • setSaveOnlyForegroundImage

        public void setSaveOnlyForegroundImage(boolean bSaveOnlyForegroundImage)
        Sets whether or not to exclude the background image when the image is saved.
        If the foreground image is saved, the save image format must be PNG type to save transparently.
        Parameters:
        bSaveOnlyForegroundImage - Whether or not to exclude the background image when the image is saved
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • setDecodePriorityFGData

        public boolean setDecodePriorityFGData(int nDecodePriorityFGData)
        Sets the priority order for decoding foreground data. The default is SAMM_DECODE_PRIORITY_FG_OBJECT.
        nDecodePriorityFGData must be between SAMM_DECODE_PRIORITY_FG_OBJECT and SAMM_DECODE_PRIORITY_FG_IMAGE.
        If nDecodePriorityFGData falls within the valid range, return true; if out of range, return false.
        Parameters:
        nDecodePriorityFGData - The priority order of decoding foreground data
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3, SAMM Library 1.7

      • getDecodePriorityFGData

        public int getDecodePriorityFGData()

        Returns:
        The priority order of decoding foreground data
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3, SAMM Library 1.7

      • setContentsQuality

        public boolean setContentsQuality(int nSaveContentsQualityOption)
        Content saving quality option settings: The default value is SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_MEDIUM, and the saving quality option must be set within the preset range (SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_MAX~SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_ORIGINAL).
        True is returned if the selected value is within nSaveContentsQualityOption, and is False if out of range.
        The saving quality option must be configured prior to entering any content.
        If the option is set to SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_MAX, contents are saved in the highest quality, but take longer to save.
        SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_MEDIUM saves contents in medium quality if their size is bigger than the maximum limit, and takes less time than SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_MAX to save data.
        SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_MINIMUM saves contents in the lowest quality if their size is bigger than the maximum limit, and takes the least time to save.
        SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_ORIGINAL saves original contents, and takes the longest time to save.
        Parameters:
        nSaveContentsQualityOption - A content quality option
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • getContentsQuality

        public int getContentsQuality()
        Gets the current quality option value of the content : SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_MAX ~ SAMM_CONTENTS_QUALITY_ORIGINAL
        Returns:
        The current quality option value of the content
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0
